name: Akome Ogi
skill: Restores 1835/2335 to a random ally. Target deals 33%/42% more DMG for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a folding fan used by women in the Imperial Court on formal occasions. Popular ones are said to resemble the owner in some way. Unlike many spirits, she doesn't have any weird hobbies or eccentric tastes; she's just beautiful. If she has any flaw it's that she looks after every single thing for her master, so any spirit agent would eventually become incapable of self-maintenance after spending too long with her.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 18/1/17
◦ Her kimono's color was initially released as red and green.

skill: "Relax and allow yourself to enjoy my dance."
limit_break: "It makes me happy to have your attention. ♪"
